trends: There have been 12 other sightings in Santa Clara
There were no other sightings in Santa Clara on or around January 31st 1961
divs: Sighting DetailsWas in kindergarden at the time when the bell rang to go back to class...when i was running back to the room i had a great sensation that some one was looking down at me and i stopped in my tracks and looked strait up..i saw a round object blending into the blue of the sky..the object was a silver whitish looking and there was a circle of black dots toward the center of the object..It wasn't a blimp from moffet field i remember those and it wasnt the moon....If you didnt know where to look in the sky you probaly would never had seen it...i looked up and and saw it imeadiatly...The teacher finaly called me into class.... when i got home that afternoon before entering my home i looked up and it was still there..that must of been 2 or 3 hours later.
Summary: saw circle shape object 12 oclock high day time
